00128 // Enable RX,TX and RX interrupt on USART
00129 // 38400 baud @ 8 MHz internal RC oscillator (error = 0.2%)
00130 // 8 bit character size, 1 stop bit and no parity mode
00135 
00136 #if F_CPU == 8000000UL
00137 #define USART_SETUP() ((UCSR(USART,B) = (1 << RXEN(USART))|(1 << TXEN(USART))|(1 << RXCIE(USART))), \
00138                        (UCSR(USART,C) = (1 << UCSZ(USART,0))|(1 << UCSZ(USART,1))), \
00139                        (UBRR(USART,H) = BAUD_RATE_38400 >> 8, UBRR(USART,L) = BAUD_RATE_38400 & 0xff))
00140 #endif
00141 #if F_CPU == 4000000UL
00142 #define USART_SETUP() ((UCSR(USART,B) = (1 << RXEN(USART))|(1 << TXEN(USART))|(1 << RXCIE(USART))), \
00143                        (UCSR(USART,C) = (1 << UCSZ(USART,0))|(1 << UCSZ(USART,1))), \
00144                        (UCSR(USART,A) = 2),                             \
00145                        (UBRR(USART,H) = BAUD_RATE_38400 >> 8, UBRR(USART,L) = BAUD_RATE_38400 & 0xff))
00146 #endif
00147 #if F_CPU == 2000000UL
00148 #define USART_SETUP() ((UCSR(USART,B) = (1 << RXEN(USART))|(1 << TXEN(USART))|(1 << RXCIE(USART))), \
00149                        (UCSR(USART,C) = (1 << UCSZ(USART,0))|(1 << UCSZ(USART,1))), \
00150                        (UBRR(USART,H) = BAUD_RATE_38400 >> 8, UBRR(USART,L) = BAUD_RATE_38400 & 0xff))
00151 #endif
00152 #if F_CPU == 1000000UL
00153 #define USART_SETUP() ((UCSR(USART,B) = (1 << RXEN(USART))|(1 << TXEN(USART))|(1 << RXCIE(USART))), \
00154                        (UCSR(USART,C) = (1 << UCSZ(USART,0))|(1 << UCSZ(USART,1))), \
00155                        (UCSR(USART,A) = 2),                             \
00156                        (UBRR(USART,H) = BAUD_RATE_38400 >> 8, UBRR(USART,L) = BAUD_RATE_38400 & 0xff))
00157 #endif

00161 #define USART_STOP() UCSR(USART,B) = 0
00163 #define USART_CHAR_READY() (!(UCSR(USART,B) & (1<<UDRIE(USART))))
00165 #define USART_DRE_WAIT() (!(UCSR(USART,A) & (1<<UDRE(USART))))
00167 #define USART_REG (UDR(USART))
00169 #define USART_DRE_ENABLE() (UCSR(USART,B) |= (1<<UDRIE(USART)))
00171 #define USART_DRE_DISABLE() ((UCSR(USART,B) &= ~(1<<UDRIE(USART))))
00173 #define USARTRXVECT RXVECT(USART)
